Table 1. Differences in soil properties between the Kohala forest soil and pasture soil. 
<sup>a</sup> ND, not determined. 
<sup>b</sup> Data from @Crews1995. 
<sup>c</sup> The overstory is dominated by M. *polymorpha*, a native C-3 tree. 
<sup>d</sup> P. clanestinum is an African C-4 grass.
